name: Wai-not-makahiki
tagline: Repository for Makahiki Build and Wai Not Widget
body:
# Welcome to the Wai Not? Widget Application!



//![IMG2](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Interface/images/main.png?raw=true)

# Information: 

"Wai Not?" is a widget add-on that is built on top of the Makahiki open source project.  It combines various game aspects to create a fun learning environment.  
  
### Current Development:
Currently the development has not been progressed much.  Most of the project is still under construction.
See the Gameplay documentation to view what has been implemented so far..  


# Project Details: 

### Documentation: 

* [Installation Guide](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Installation-Guide)
* [User Guide](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/User-Guide)
* [Gameplay](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Gameplay)
* [Game Content](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Game-Content)
* [Game Interface](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Game-Interface)
* [Game Evaluation](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Game-Evaluation)

### Project Community:

* [Requests Page] (https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Requests)
* [Contact Us](https://github.com/justinslee/Wai-Not-Makahiki/wiki/Contact-Us)
